title: Failed to load URL "https://riot:MGb2c0U8B7adZR5VEY9H9A@127.0.0.1:49869/index.html" with error "time
body: Failed to load URL "https://riot:MGb2c0U8B7adZR5VEY9H9A@127.0.0.1:49869/index.html" with error "timed out" (-7). I get this error message and  cannot log on or even close the tab or open a new one making me restart my computer.

replies.body: Typically that 'timed out (-7)' means that something is blocking your network from being able to reach our login servers reliably, which is why you're seeing that weird URL error. We should be able to get you back in by going over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and making sure everything is configured in the best way for League.
